long_description: Designed specifically for mountain biking, the Topeak Mini 9 MT multitool offers 9 tools, including Torx(R) wrenches, in a compact and easily stowable form. Tools include 2, 3, 4, 5, 6mm Allen wrenches, T10, T15, and T25 Torx wrenches and a #2 Phillips screwdriver; tools are made from hardened steel for lasting use. Tools fold and nestle neatly against the tough and lightweight extruded one-piece alloy body. Topeak Mini 9 MT multitool comes with a small neoprene case.
short_description: Designed specifically for mountain biking, the Topeak Mini 9 MT multitool offers 9 tools, including Torx(R) wrenches, in a compact and easily stowable form.
